title: [Update: Rolling out] Google Phone app tests a Material You redesign for the dial pad
content:
Google Phone has greatly evolved over the last few years, going from a basic dialer app to one of the most powerful phone calling apps. Over time, it has gained several notable features, including call recording, the ability to filter out spam and fraud calls, Automatic Call Screen, Caller ID feature, and much more. Back

The post [Update: Rolling out] Google Phone app tests a Material You redesign for the dial pad appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The Google Phone is testing a revamped UI for dial pad, which adds bigger, more prominent touchpad buttons. Read on.
